message.body: Are Tristate and PCOM near each other? My exam at PCOM will be over by 5ish. I think you're done Saturday around the same time.
My school is at 14th and 8th ave. I'm sure their close...whats the addy?
Yeah, we'll both be in Manhattan...we're close, prob by 15 min walk tops.easy.

Yah! Lets text each other when we're done with our days. Mine says I will be out by 5. Would you be up for eating with some of my classmates? I want to spend time with you but I'm also trying not to be snobby and run away from everyone. Either way is ok.
Yeah, that would be rad...lets touch base Friday and see where we're at. Can't wait!
Perfect. Talk/text to you Friday and see you Saturday!! I will be running around alot on Friday so check on if you don't hear from me. I'm excited too. :)
